meanings.definition: Very thin or slender in form or thickness.
meanings.sent2: She wore an ultrathin scarf to stay cool in the summer.
meanings.sent3: The ultrathin ice cream sandwich melted in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her patience was as ultrathin as a delicate thread.
meanings.sent5: The ultrathin thread held the beads together delicately.

meanings.definition: A device or material that is extremely thin.
meanings.sent1: The new smartphone boasted an ultrathin design.
meanings.sent2: He carefully handled the ultrathin glass sheet.
meanings.sent3: The ultrathin laptop was so light, it felt like a feather!
meanings.sent4: The ultrathin screen displayed vibrant colors like a painting.
meanings.sent5: The ultrathin fabric was perfect for creating sleek clothing designs.
